mapper.sql: Review_ID, Review_PLSJ, Review_NR, Review_PLR, Review_DELFLAG, BBS_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into REVIEW
Review_ID,
Review_PLSJ,
Review_NR,
Review_PLR,
Review_DELFLAG,
BBS_ID,
#{reviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reviewPlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{reviewNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reviewDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{bbsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update REVIEW
Review_PLSJ = #{reviewPlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Review_NR = #{reviewNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Review_PLR = #{reviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Review_DELFLAG = #{reviewDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
BBS_ID = #{bbsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Review_ID = #{reviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update REVIEW set Review_PLSJ = #{reviewPlsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Review_NR = #{reviewNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Review_PLR = #{reviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Review_DELFLAG = #{reviewDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BBS_ID = #{bbsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Review_ID = #{reviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select Review_ID, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), Review_PLSJ, 20)) PLSJ, Review_NR, Review_PLR, Review_DELFLAG, BBS_ID from REVIEW where BBS_ID = #{bbsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select Review_ID, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), Review_PLSJ, 20)) PLSJ, Review_NR, Review_PLR, Review_DELFLAG, BBS_ID from REVIEW where Review_PLR = #{reviewPlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select Review_ID, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), Review_PLSJ, 20)) PLSJ, Review_NR, Review_PLR, Review_DELFLAG, BBS_ID from REVIEW

select count(*) from REVIEW where Review_DELFLAG = 1
and BBS_ID = #{bbsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select top 5 Review_ID, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), Review_PLSJ, 20)) PLSJ, Review_NR, Review_PLR, Review_DELFLAG, BBS_ID from REVIEW where BBS_ID in (select BBS_ID from BBS where BBS_FBR = #{bbsFbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by Review_PLSJ ASC

select count(*) from REVIEW where Review_DELFLAG = 1
and BBS_ID = #{bbsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and REVIEW_NR like '%${reviewNr}%'
and REVIEW_PLR like '%${reviewPlr}%'

select Review_ID, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), Review_PLSJ, 20)) PLSJ, Review_NR, Review_PLR, Review_DELFLAG, BBS_ID from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from REVIEW T where Review_DELFLAG = 1
and BBS_ID = #{bbsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and REVIEW_NR like '%${reviewNr}%'
and REVIEW_PLR like '%${reviewPlr}%'
order by T.Review_PLSJ ASC ) as t1 order by Review_PLSJ DESC) as t2 order by Review_PLSJ ASC
